description:
Fedezd fel Budapest pezsgő világát a Programok Budapesten appal! Legyen szó spontán esti sörözésről, egy romantikus randiról vagy különleges programokról, itt mindig találsz valami izgalmasat.

Böngéssz kategóriák között, válogass kedved szerint, és találd meg a város rejtett kincseit. Az egyszerű szűrők és keresők segítenek abban, hogy pontosan azt az élményt találd meg, amit keresel.

Ráadásul partnereink rendszeresen kínálnak kedvezményeket és promóciókat, így nemcsak új helyeket próbálhatsz ki, hanem közben spórolhatsz is.

Töltsd le most, és indulj el felfedezni Budapest legjobb arcát – egyetlen koppintással.

We know where you can find the flavours that fit you.  If there's one thing we know it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check if we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.

WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE?

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.se

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com/

developer: Munch Europe Szolgaltato Korlatolt Felelossegu Tarsasag
description:
(B)eat food waste and get yourself some tasty bites!
With Munch application you can get unsold products of great quality at a discounted price from local restaurants, bakeries, hotels and grocery stores.
Explore more than 3000 partners' packages in the whole country and purchase for even 50-70% off!
All of the surprise packages contain high-quality food, so you're not only doing good for the environment or your wallet, but also for yourself.
With the Munch application, you can not only save food at a discount at your favourite places, but also get to know new shops, bakeries or restaurants.
Follow these few easy steps and start (b)eating food waste with a few clicks:
1. Download the app
2. Explore the available discount packages
3. Purchase and pay for them easily via the app
4. Get the package in the specified time slot
5. Enjoy delicious food that you just saved from waste
You are only one registration away from stepping on the path of sustainability where we can (b)eat food waste together!

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Töltsd le most és regisztrálj a megújult BK® applikáción és élvezd az előnyöket!

1. Rendelj 4 egyszerű lépésben és felejtsd el a sorban állást:

a. Állítsd össze a rendelésed,

b. Válaszd az online fizetést (Bankkártya, Apple vagy Google Pay, SZÉP-kártya) vagy válaszd a kasszánál fizetek opciót

c. Menj az étterem 100 m-es körzetébe és add le a rendelésed

d. Ha jelezzük az appon vagy a monitoron, hogy kész a rendelés, akkor vedd át az erre kijelölt területen

2. Érd el a legexkluzívabb BURGER KING® kuponokat csak a BK® appon

3. Csatlakozz az új MyBurgerKing törzsvásárlói programhoz, húzd be az ingyenes ajándékokat és élvezd a BK® Bónusz előnyöket!

4. Szeretnél extra bacont vagy sajtot, netalántán jalapenot a szendvicsedbe? Randiznál és elhagynád a hagymát? Ezeket is simán megteheted a megújult appban!

5. Mondd el a véleményed! Minden appos rendelés után lehetőséged lesz értékelni az élményed, amit extra koronával jutalmazunk! A jónak nagyon örülünk, a hibáinkból pedig nagyon sokat tanulunk

6. Rendeld újra kedvenceidet 1 kattintással

….és ez nem minden! Folyamatosan fejlesztjük, javítjuk az appot a ti visszajelzéseitek alapján, így érdemes mindig frissíteni a BK® Appot.

A fentebb felsorolt funkciók eléréséhez regisztráció szükséges, amelyre e-mail cím megadásával van lehetőség. Az alkalmazásban található funkciók működéséhez és frissítéséhez internetkapcsolat szükséges. A BURGER KING® applikációt kizárólag 16 éven felüliek tölthetik le, illetve használhatják.

Order to your home or workplace simply from the KFC app.

1. Enter the address, which the app remembers and you don't have to enter it later.
2. Choose your favorites or something new from the KFC range!
3, Order and sit back.
4, The courier will ring after about 30 minutes.

You'll also find discount coupons in the App that you can't find anywhere else!
You can use them in every KFC. The app helps you find our nearest restaurant.

Order without queuing! You can place your order in advance, which will be ready at the specified time and in the specified restaurant, you do not have to wait at the cash register.
You can order up to 10 minutes before arriving at the restaurant!
You can make the payment conveniently and securely with a bank card, in the app, through the PayU online system.

Sign up! Home delivery and pre-order are only available this way!

Online shopping is easier than ever. With Tesco Online Shopping app, you can easily and flexibly manage your daily shopping from anywhere online. Choose your favorite products or simply repeat your previous order. 

Choose the delivery time that best suits you. Any time from 8 am to 10pm. And have your order delivered to your door! We also have a click and collect service from our selected stores.

Depending on your location, Tesco From Home shopping service or Tesco in a Box service is available to you. With Tesco in a Box service you can choose from more than 1 000 products online and shop conveniently non-perishable food, beverages, cosmetics, household needs, detergents, products for babies or pets. Products are always carefully selected by employees of Tesco and delivered by courier even to the smallest villages or towns.

Benefits of Tesco Online shopping:
Choose from 14 000 high quality products!
Buy at the same price as in the store!
Choose the most convenient delivery time interval for you, from 8 am to 10 pm every day!

Experience the world of Nespresso on your iPhone or iPad.

The Nespresso app allows you to buy coffee capsules, machines and accessories on-the-go or at home on your iOS device.
Enjoy the Nespresso shopping experience anytime, anywhere:
•	Refill your stock of capsules and explore new coffees
•	Find the right machine for you, and exclusive accessories to complete your coffee corner at home
•	Stay up to date with the latest Nespresso Limited Edition coffees
•	Discover the nearest Nespresso points of interest on the store locator (Nespresso Boutiques, retail stores selling Nespresso coffee machines, and coffee capsule recycling points)
Do even more with the app with one of our ‘connected’ machines:
•	Get notified when your capsule stock is running low to ensure you never run out 
•	Navigate through recipes to nurture your inner barista
•	Ensure the best coffee experience cup after cup through regular notifications from your machine on when descaling is needed, or the water tank is nearly empty
•	Get direct access to machine “How-to” videos

Take advantage of our extensive delivery services*, such as:
•	Free Standard or Pick Up Point delivery on purchases of coffee capsules and machines
•	Nespresso Boutique Pick-Up
•	Nespresso Express delivery 
•	Nespresso Saturday & Sunday delivery
•	Nespresso Your Time (choose the most convenient date and time of your delivery)
*Availability and conditions of each service depend on your geographical area

Discover authentic street foods from around the world with Flavor Road. This comprehensive app helps you explore, track, and learn about traditional street foods through an interactive map, detailed encyclopedia, and personal food passport.
Navigate through a beautiful map interface to find street food locations across different countries and cities. Each food entry includes rich details like ingredients, flavors, cultural history, vendor stories, and dining etiquette. Filter foods by category, dietary preferences, or occasion to find exactly what you're looking for.
Build your culinary passport by marking foods as tried and adding favorites to your collection. Track your food journey with detailed statistics showing your exploration progress across different countries and food categories. Unlock achievements as you discover new foods and expand your culinary horizons.
Perfect for food enthusiasts, travelers, and anyone curious about global street food culture. Whether you're planning a trip or simply want to learn about different cuisines, Flavor Road brings the world's street food scene to your fingertips.

Experience the authentic flavors of padthai wokbar with our new app! The loyalty program that makes every order special! Here’s what the padthai WOKSTAR app offers:

- Order your padthai favorites with ease! Easily and quickly create your favorite combination or choose from our special and popular offers. Whether you want to dine in, take it away, or have it delivered, we’ve got you covered!
- Create your own combination! Assemble your unique padthai dish with your favorite ingredients. Choose from bases, proteins, toppings, sauces, and extras, and try out new, exciting flavor combinations!
- Collect points and redeem them for discounts! Each dish earns different points, which you can track in the app. Scan the My QR code before ordering at the checkout or kiosks. Every 1 point = 15 HUF discount. Register and immediately get 70 entry points! Collect at least 75 points and redeem them to reduce your total order amount.
- Find the nearest padthai wokbar! Craving padthai on the go? Use the app to instantly find the nearest restaurant and get directions!
- Get notified about exclusive offers and promotions! As a WOKSTAR member, be the first to taste our latest dishes and stay informed about special offers and exciting events.
 
Why download the padthai app?

- Intuitive, user-friendly design for a smooth ordering experience.
- Real-time updates on your order status.
- Secure payment options for a safe experience.
- The perfect choice for those who love padthai wokbar’s authentic flavors and are looking for comfort, rewards, and extra flavors!
 
Download the padthai app now, become a WOKSTAR, and take your love for Asian flavors to the next level! Enjoy easy, fast ordering, discounts, and unique experiences with every meal, anywhere, anytime!

A FoodRevo alkalmazással gyorsan és kényelmesen rendelhetsz prémium minőségű ételeket a FoodRevolution konyhájából – akár egy teljes hétre előre. Minden nap friss, változatos kínálat, messze a menzaminőség felett.

Prémium ételek minden nap
Minden fogás gondosan megtervezett recept alapján, minőségi alapanyagokból készül séfeink által.

Heti menü, előrendelés lehetőséggel
Válaszd ki kedvenc ételeidet a heti kínálatból, és rendelj előre akár az egész hétre.

Kényelmes rendelés az appon keresztül

- Regisztráció és bejelentkezés pillanatok alatt
- Heti menü böngészése, ételválasztás, rendelés
- Előző rendelések, kedvencek és értesítések

Modern, biztonságos fizetés
Fizess egyszerűen közvetlenül az appban bankkártyával, Apple Pay vagy Google Pay segítségével.

Are you hungry? Fantastico

Experience La Bella Vita with the Bellozzo App – Your Favorites, Your Way, Anytime, Anywhere!

Download the Bellozzo app and register today to unlock a seamless, personalized food experience:

Pre-order with ease for your preferred time

Skip the line and get your favorites faster

Pay securely online with Apple Pay, Google Pay, or your saved SZÉP card

Join our loyalty program and collect Tomatoes for exciting rewards and products

Find the nearest Bellozzo location with just a tap

Customize your meal – choose your perfect pasta, pizza, or salad just the way you like it

Enjoy the taste of Italy at your fingertips — simpler, faster, and more convenient than ever before!

Registration with a valid email address is required to access all app features. An internet connection is necessary for functionality and updates. The Belli app is available for users aged 16 and above.

Serving the highest quality burgers, fries and shakes.


Download the app and order from your phone anytime.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

Transform your everyday ingredients and cook delicious meals with Cookpad! Designed for home cooks of all skill levels, Cookpad offers step by step easy-to-follow, flavorful recipes. Explore a vast collection of recipes, save your favorites, and use Cookpad as your personal recipe organizer with themed folders. Share your own creations and discover new dishes from a vibrant food-loving community. Download Cookpad today and start cooking!

MAIN FATURES:

Endless inspiration, thousands of recipes for your everyday meals: 
- From tasty & healthy breakfasts to quick lunches and mouth-watering dinners, explore thousands of home-cooked recipes. And don’t forget the desserts—baked, frozen, or made in an air fryer!
- Global flavors: Discover dishes from Spanish, Italian, Thai, Japanese, and other cuisines 
- Ingredient-based search: Cook great meals with what you already have in your fridge or pantry. Save money, reduce food waste, and make cooking more enjoyable.
- Catering to all diets: Use filters to find recipes for specific preferences like vegan, vegetarian, keto, gluten-free, and more
- Healthy and diverse cooking methods: From roasting and grilling to using an air fryer, Instant Pot, or slow cooker, find a variety of methods in one powerful app 

Keep all your recipes organized in one sole place:
- Build your personal collection of recipes and keep all your cooking adventures organized
- Create private folders by category (such as fish or meat recipes, desserts, etc.) and plan your weekly menus effortlessly

Share your cooking creations:
- Share your favorite recipes with friends, family, or the Cookpad community
- Or keep your creations private, just for you

Join a vibrant community:
- Connect with passionate home cooks, follow other food creators, and get help in the kitchen when you need it
- Upload photos (cooksnaps) of the dishes you’ve cooked and share your cooking experience with others.
- Cookpad is designed for everyone—from beginners to experienced cooks—and for any occasion, from daily meals to special gatherings. 

Cookpad app is ads-free
- Enjoy a seamless free from interruption cooking experience with Cookpad app!

Cookpad is free to download and use. For those looking to enhance their experience, we offer an optional subscription service with the following features:
- Get the most popular recipes at the top of search results with Premium Search.
- Save unlimited recipes from other home cooks, so you always have inspiration at hand.
- Use advanced search filters to match your cooking preferences.

Cookpad Premium is available in Arabic speaking countries, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, France, Greece, Hungary, India (English only), Indonesia, Italy, Malaysia, Mexico, Romania, Poland, Spain, Taiwan, Thailand, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay and Vietnam.

Terms & Conditions: 
- Your monthly payment will be charged to your Apple ID account 
- Your subscription is automatically renewed month by month, unless you cancel it with a minimum of 24 hours before the end of the current period 
- Your account will be renewed in the 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Unless stated otherwise at the point of subscription, the monthly renewal cost is the same as the initial cost. 
- Subscriptions are managed by you and auto-renewal of the Premium Service can be canceled by going to your Apple ID account settings after purchase. 
- Read the full Terms & Conditions here. https://cookpad.com/en/terms 
- Read the privacy policy here: https://cookpad.com/en/privacy Get in touch with us: help@cookpad.com

Contact us with any feedback or suggestions: help@cookpad.com

A Benjalex hibrid rendszerű: adatbázist használ, de ha egy termék nincs benne, online azonnal kiértékeli a címkét. Más appok ilyenkor nem tudnak információt adni, a Benjalex viszont továbbra is működik. Bárhol használható, minden helyzetben megbízhatóan felismeri és elemzi az élelmiszereket. Innovatív, modern és valóban forradalmi megoldás az élelmiszer-címkék értelmezésében.

Ha egy termék még nincs az adatbázisban, a Benjalex lehetőséget ad a felhasználóknak, hogy online azonnal feltöltsék. A termék csak akkor kerülhet be az adatbázisba, ha a Benjalex csapatának adminisztrátora jóváhagyta — így garantált a pontos, ellenőrzött információ.

developer: MGD - GMW Sp. z o.o. Sp. k.
description:
Topjoy – Flip a cap, spark a smile!

Tired of the same old routine? Start your day with us! The Topjoy app greets you every morning with a brand-new message – it might be an inspiring thought or a funny line. All you have to do is tap the virtual cap – and your day just might turn in a better direction!

Every moment is a joy with Topjoy.
The Topjoy app isn’t just an app – it’s a daily mood booster. Each morning, you can’t wait to flip your daily cap and read the message meant just for you. Some quotes are deep and inspiring, others light and humorous – but they always arrive just when you need them most.

The cap isn’t just text. It’s a spark, a little positive push to lift your mood. A mini Topjoy moment you can enjoy anywhere, anytime.

There’s always a new message under the cap.
Every single cap is a new opportunity. A new idea. A new inspiration. Topjoy is more than just a drink – it’s a feeling. And this app brings that feeling to you digitally, every single day. One simple tap and your message of the day appears.

Many users collect their favorite quotes, others share them with friends or family. These cap messages don’t just entertain – they create connections. Yes, sometimes a great mood really does start with something this simple.

Features you’ll love:
- Daily Cap Flip: Get a fresh motivational, funny, or thoughtful message every day.
- Share Function: Share your favorite cap messages with one tap.
- Creative Design & Experience: Youthful, vibrant, dynamic, and customizable – just like Topjoy.
- Notifications: Stay in the loop with alerts for daily caps and new giveaways.

Motivation that costs nothing – just a moment.
No time to meditate or read self-help books? A quick cap message might be all it takes to shift your mindset. The best things are often the simplest. One cap. One quote. One quick smile. And you already feel better.

Whether you’re at the bus stop, on your way to school or work, the Topjoy app is always there – just one tap away from a burst of positivity.

Why download it?
- Because you love motivational messages.
- Because you’re curious what’s under the next cap.
- Because you want to see what others are loving.
- Because you love the Topjoy vibe.
- Because a little motivation goes a long way – every single day.

Tip: Turn on push notifications!
This way, you’ll never miss your daily cap. Sometimes motivation is just a tap away.

Download the Topjoy app now and add a splash of color to your everyday.

One cap – one experience.
One message – a fresh start.

EggRow Keeper is a charming fridge inventory app with a unique twist — everything is designed around the metaphor of eggs in a refrigerator. The interface looks like a cozy fridge, and each product is visualized as an item in a nest, with eggs taking center stage. It helps users track food items, monitor expiration dates, estimate the total value of their fridge, and manage a shopping list — all wrapped in a light-hearted, visually engaging experience.

The main screen displays your virtual fridge with organized shelves. You can add products manually, specifying name, category, quantity, purchase date, and expiration. Categories include dairy, vegetables, meat, eggs, and others — each placed on its own "shelf." Eggs are treated as a special product type, displayed in a dedicated egg tray. When an item expires, it’s marked with a distinct “rotten egg” icon for quick recognition. You can also view a filtered list of soon-to-expire or missing items.

EggRow Keeper includes a simple analysis tool. When adding items, you can enter their price (per unit, kilogram, liter, etc.). The app then calculates the total "value" of your fridge contents. A category breakdown shows where most of your spending goes (e.g., "Dairy — 38%"). It also keeps track of patterns — how often you buy eggs, which items run out the fastest, and more.

The integrated shopping list helps with restocking. Items that are out of stock are suggested for the list automatically, but you can add or remove anything manually. Once an item is marked “purchased,” it can be moved directly into your fridge. You can also sort the list by category, making trips to the store more efficient.

A unique feature of the app is the “Egg of the Day” — a daily card offering a fun fact, quote, or practical food storage tip. The cards come in various humorous moods like “The Philosopher Egg” or “The Proud Egg.” You can save these cards to your gallery or share them with friends on social media.

Additional settings include expiration reminders, currency and unit preferences, data reset, and access to the privacy policy and developer info. EggRow Keeper offers a practical yet playful approach to home food organization — especially for egg lovers.

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

PizzApp computes the ingredients needed to obtain a dough with the selected features and suggests the amount of yeast to be used. It also lets you save your recipes, reload and share them.

Keep your recipes organised. Use the meal planner to create weekly meal plans. Create shopping lists with ease and cook from your own recipe book.

Have you ever lost a great recipe? Stashcook to the rescue. Stashcook is your personal recipe keeper and virtual cookbook. Never again will you lose a delicious recipe.

~ Save recipes from ANYWHERE!
Use the stash button to save recipes from any website on the internet. This includes BBC Good Food, Pinterest, Food Network, and Epicurious, to name but a few.

~ Meal planning
What's on the menu today? Check your weekly meal planner. Prepare meal plans and organise your week. Rearrange based on what you fancy that day. Add notes to ensure you remember to use those leftovers or your plans to eat out. Stashcook can also help save money and decrease food waste by reducing your weekly shopping list to only what you need.

~ Shopping list
Simplify shopping with the most simple grocery list available. First, add all the ingredients from any of your recipes. Then, manually add any other items you need and let Stashcook organise them by supermarket aisle. Never again will you forget the milk!

~ Organise recipes into collections
Use collections to group recipes. Need a quick dinner option? Just look in the "10-minute dinners" collection you made.

~ Cook
Stashcook aims to make following a recipe easier. It has been created with simplicity in mind and removes the annoying clutter found on recipe sites.

~ Free - No Limits
Stash as many recipes as you like. Prepare meal plans every week without restrictions. No charges and no membership is required.
